thread.title: Digitimes Research Android Pay to become a prevailing mobile payment tool
thread.title_full: Digitimes Research Android Pay to become a prevailing mobile payment tool

title: Digitimes Research Android Pay to become a prevailing mobile payment tool
text:
Digitimes Research: Android Pay to become a prevailing mobile payment tool 
Digitimes Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Android Pay, announced at Google I/O 2015, will eventually beat Apple Pay to capture a majority share of the global mobile payment market, making "payment apps as a service" a prevailing mobile service, according to Digitimes Research....
